property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Show Dropdown List in Masthead: Language Personalization for Anonymous Users

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Language' dropdown list in the masthead. This enables anonymous users to personalize the language of the portal at runtime

property.name: com.sap.portal.pcm.Title
property.value: Ajax FWK Masthead iView

property.value: Framework Mode
